projects.title: retrocord
projects.description: discord, redesigned in windows-98 style for codedex mini holiday hackathon 2024 under the 'dot-com' boom track, built w/ typescript + next.js + react + css.

projects.title: popkiz
projects.description: highly customizable stage-based react app to wish your favorite ones in style, built w/ typescript + react.

projects.title: papertrail
projects.description: team that1bit's submission under problem statement SIH1614 for SIH2024. a web app built with typescript + next.js + react to summarize a faculty member's tex-based academic records using an llm.

projects.title: w3
projects.description: my cool & minimal portfolio revamped w/ next.js + react + tailwindcss optimized for performance + seo.

projects.title: aria2py
projects.description: a json-rpc api wrapper for interacting w/ the aria2 daemon, offering programmatic control over downloads.

projects.title: nextpy
projects.description: an open-source anime streaming platform built with next.js, react, tailwindcss + shadcn, based on its parent project senpy.

projects.title: senpy
projects.description: a cli-based anime downloader written in python integrated w/ aria2 for optimized downloads, highly efficient + customizable.

projects.title: pookiefy
projects.description: a simple next.js app that shows spotify player state in real-time using the spotify api, built with react + tailwindcss.

projects.title: thereisnoweb
projects.description: a functionally dysfunctional hack built for hackathon with lewis 2024. there's only one way to find out if there's a website or not, and that's by visiting it. a sweet little surprise at the end.

projects.title: retrorings
projects.description: an 8-bit rpg-themed application written w/ next.js, react, tailwindcss, chart.js, fastapi and pytorch designed to predict outcomes for the 2024 paris olympics for codedex summer hackathon 2024.

projects.title: how-cli
projects.description: context aware ai-based cli application built using langchain + typer to help you with command line and shell.

projects.title: nextgw
projects.description: a python-based tool integrating youtube api, ffmpeg, next.js + react to get streamable playlists of lectures from subscribed pw batches with some youtube automation.

projects.title: openrain
projects.description: a simple rainmeter skin that displays current weather using openweathermap apis, forked from rek42/simple-openweathermap.

projects.title: rudra-django
projects.description: a personal portfolio website built with django, tailwindcss + postgresql, featuring a timeline, blog, dashboard, user auth + portfolio sections.

projects.title: crap-bot
projects.description: a deep-learning powered chatbot for champawat district, developed @ dr. a. p. j abdul kalam institute of technology, tanakpur.

projects.title: craiyon.py
projects.description: an api wrapper around craiyon.com (formerly known as dal-e-mini) for python, used to generate images from text tokens.

projects.title: i-scream
projects.description: a multipurpose single-guilded discord bot built specifically for ayusanimation's server consisting of a variety of commands sufficient enough to manage a large guild.

projects.title: anime-rpc
projects.description: a discord rich presence client that shows anime info on your discord profile, letting you share what you're watching as a rich presence status.

projects.title: pwutils
projects.description: a set of utilities made to enhance the experience of using physicswallah's website.

projects.title: pyqtts
projects.description: an open-source gui-based text-to-speech application built with the qt framework.

projects.title: pymemo
projects.description: a cli-based memo app for saving + reading notes and todos locally, developed as a school project.

projects.title: bsdotpy
projects.description: an api wrapper around bombsquad's api, designed to fetch player account data using python.

projects.title: pymailer
projects.description: an open-source gui-based mail sender built with the qt framework (pyside2) and smtplib.

projects.title: pyshop
projects.description: a shopping cart simulator demonstrating the working of a minimal cart, written in python + sqlite3.

projects.title: shortyy
projects.description: a custom branded url shortener built using flask + postgresql, a free and open-source alternative to paid services.
